subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=4|rs=夊06|kyu=變}}

# [[change]]
# [[strange]]; [[odd]]
# used to denote [[flat]] [[accidental|accidentals]] of musical notes

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|変態|へんたい}}: metamorphosis, a transformation
* {{ja-r|変成|へんせい}}: [[metamorphic]]
* {{ja-r|変成岩|へんせいがん}}: [[metamorphic rock]]
* {{ja-r|変更|へんこう}}: a [[change]] in a [[plan]], [[idea]], or [[script]]
* {{ja-r|変装|へんそう}}: a [[disguise]]
* {{ja-r|変身|へんしん}}: [[transformation]]
* {{ja-r|変化|へんか}}: a transformation, a [[metamorphosis]]; a [[makeover]]
* {{ja-r|変化|へんげ}}: ghost, apparition
* {{ja-r|変形|へんけい}}: a transformation, [[deformation]], [[metamorphosis]]
* {{ja-r|変移|へんい}}: [[transmutation]]
* {{ja-r|変貌|へんぼう}}: [[transfiguring]] one's own appearance; a [[glamour]]
* {{ja-r|変容|へんよう}}: [[shapeshifting]]
* {{ja-r|変わり|かわり}}: [[change]]; [[alteration]]; [[substitute]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Adjectival noun
